required.name: Belize
required.note: Visa not required for A max. stay of 90 days for holders of a valid visa issued by a Schengen Member. Holders of a valid multiple entry visa issued by the USA can obtain a visa on arrival

required.name: Bhutan
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Cameroon
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Canada
required.note: Visa not required for permanent residents of the United States.

required.name: China
required.note:
Visa not required for holders of normal Macedonian passports endorsed "on business".
72-hours visa free visit when in transit at Beijing, Chengdu, Chongqing, Dalian, Guangzhou, Guilin, Shanghai, Shenyang and Xi'an.

required.name: Costa Rica
required.note: Visa not required for holders of a visa issued by the USA (except for B1, B2, C1 and D visas), provided valid for at least 6 months from date of arrival. Additionally a max. stay of 30 days is allowed for residents of Canada or an EU Member provided the residence is valid for at least 6 months on arrival.

required.name: Eritrea
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Fiji
required.note: Negotiations to abolish visa requirements are currently in progress

required.name: Ghana
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Republic of Ireland
required.note: Visa is issued free of charge.

required.name: Liberia
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Libya
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Mexico
required.note: Visa not required for holders of a valid visa issued by the USA and permanent residents of the European Union.

required.name: Nigeria
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Sierra Leone
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Trinidad and Tobago
required.note: Transit visa required.

required.name: Turkmenistan
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: United Arab Emirates
required.note: Visas can be arranged online through an airline.

required.name: United Kingdom
required.note: Travellers do not require a Direct Airside Transit (DAT) visa if they hold a valid entry visa for Australia, Canada, New Zealand or the United States, and a valid airline ticket for travel via the United Kingdom, as part of a journey to or from one of those countries. Additionally permanent residents of the European Union, Australia, Canada and New Zealand do not require a Direct Airside Transit visa.

required.name: Uzbekistan
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Vietnam
required.note: Pre-arranged visa obtained online through travel agencies available at Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh City or Da Nang airports.

not-required.name: Belarus
not-required.note: 30 days only if holding a private invitation or tourist document.

not-required.name: Dominican Republic
not-required.note: 90 days (10 USD Tourist Card valid for 30 days must be purchased upon arrival)

not-required.name: Montenegro
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days, ID Card valid

not-required.name: Russia
not-required.note: 30 days only if holding a letter of invitation or a tourist voucher.

not-required.name: Ukraine
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days (from 16 March 2015 to 15 Matrh 2018)

evisa.name: Antigua and Barbuda
evisa.note:
Negotiations to abolish visa requirements are currently in progress
Permanent residents of the United States and Canada and holders of valid visas of the United States, Canada, Schengen Area and the United Kingdom do not require a visa.

evisa.name: Ivory Coast
evisa.note: 3 months; eVisa holders must arrive via Port Bouet Airport.

evisa.name: Gabon
evisa.note: eVisa holders must arrive via Libreville International Airport.

evisa.name: Georgia (country)
evisa.note: up to 90 days. Visa not required for A max. stay of 90 days for holders of a valid visa issued by an EEA Member State, Australia, Bahrain, Canada, Israel, Japan, Korea (Rep.), Kuwait, New Zealand, Oman, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Switzerland, USA or United Arab Emirates

on-arrival.name: Bangladesh
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Cambodia
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Visa is also obtainable online.

on-arrival.name: Cape Verde
on-arrival.note: Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Djibouti
on-arrival.note: Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Jordan
on-arrival.note: Conditions apply. Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Kyrgyzstan
on-arrival.note: 1 month. Available at Manas International Airport.

on-arrival.name: Laos
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Lebanon
on-arrival.note: 1 month extendable for 2 additional months; granted free of charge at Beirut International Airport or any other port of entry if there is no Israeli visa or seal, holding a telephone number, an address in Lebanon, and a non refundable return or circle trip ticket.

on-arrival.name: Somalia
on-arrival.note:
30 days, provided an invitation letter issued by the sponsor has been submitted
to the Airport Immigration Department at least 2 days before arrival.

on-arrival.name: East Timor
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Uganda
on-arrival.note: Determined at the port of entry. May apply online.
